name: GP-33 MOD Grenade Launcher
description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Grenade Launcher
Class: Ballistic
Magazine Size: 6
Rate Of Fire: 40 rpm
Effective Range: Variable (80m)
Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (N/A), Underbarrel (S1)
Enemies will either scatter or splatter when you turn the GP-33 MOD in their direction. This military-grade launcher fires 40mm grenades to clear rooms and flush out enemies behind cover. Those that don't immediately flee will feel the pain, as Behring's precision design also includes a feature that primes each grenade to explode on impact.
description_cn:
制造商：贝林财团(Behring)
物品类型：榴弹发射器
类型：实弹
子弹尺寸：6
射速：40 rpm
有效射程：可变(80米)
附件：瞄具(S1), 枪管 (N/A), 下挂 (S1)
当你把GP-33 MOD转向敌人的方向时，敌人要么抱头鼠窜要么血溅当场。这个军用级别的榴弹发射器可以发射40mm的榴弹来清空房间把掩体里的敌人赶出来。而那些没有第一时间离开的人将会感到巨大的痛苦。因为贝林有一个巧妙的设计，这个功能可以确保每个榴弹在撞击时立刻爆炸。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-Skutters_Armor_Weap
